column5: Headed up to pefferlaw Wed to pick up bait thought i would stop a fish with Steve's Fish Huts for the day while i was there ..perch joined me for the ride . fishing was kinda slow in the 1st hut but i picked up moved over to another hut and it was none stop action lots of small perch but we still managed a limit between both of us ..i should have went fishing for whiteys and lakers all guys in the bus with us got there limits of whiteys and lakers by 9:30 am ..if anybody is intrested in getting whitefish or lakers get up there now fishing is hot right now ..
